mapper.select: select id from mis_user where username = #{username} and password = #{password}

select p.permission_code as permission from db_hospital.mis_user u join mis_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id join mis_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id join mis_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.id = ${userId}
select job,ref_id as refId from mis_user where id=${id}

select u.id as id, u.username as username, u.password as password, u.name as name, u.sex as sex, u.tel as tel, u.email as email, u.job as job, u.status as status, md.name as deptName from mis_user as u join medical_dept as md on u.dept_id=md.id where 1=1 and u.name like '%${name}%' and md.id=${deptId} and u.job=#{job} and u.status=${status} limit ${length} offset #{start}
